item.p: The ulist element can contain an optional title element followed by one or more item elements. Each child item element contains any general inline elements.
The ulist element can occur in any general block context, including inside pages, sections, and certain block elements.
The style attribute takes a space-separated list of style hints. Processing tools should adjust their behavior according to those style hints they understand.
The ulist element can have attributes from external namespaces. See for more information on external-namespace attributes.
